name: Generic Maze Maker
description:
A game where you have 2 options, 2 very important choices...

1: Play an example level!

2: Create a maze that doesn't save! (yet)

Use Wasd/Cursor Keys to move in "Play" mode, and use mouse to look around.

Use Wasd/Cursor keys to move in "Create" mode, and use mouse to place.

Made for the 'My First Game Jam: Winter 2023 Game Jam'.
